DOC.brief_summary: The purpose is to collect real life data on the use of fulvestrant in normal clinical practice in Austria and document the clinical benefit of fulvestrant treatment.
DOC.brief_title: Faslodex International Observational Non-Interventional Study in Advanced Breast Cancer (BC)
DOC.criteria: Postmenopausal women with hormone receptorpositive locally advanced or metastatic breast cancer Ability to read and write and complete questionnaires Provision of written informed consent Patients who already received a prescription for fulvestrant A subject who does not fulfil all the above mentioned inclusion criteria is not allowed to participate in this NIS
DOC.keyword: Collect real life data in clinical practice across Austria
